item.title: Sausage Pasta
item.description: This recipe is primarily based on https://www.rachelcooks.com/2018/03/12/instant-pot-pasta-sausage-spinach/, but with some further inspiration from https://www.budgetbytes.com/italian-wonderpot/. You can also use Pork Sausage links, or a regular package of sausage as well. Drain extra grease before adding pasta if needed. You can experiment with using sweet or spicy sausage as well, depending on what you like.
